SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class manages the game logic and interactions between players and the game model. It handles actions, chat messages, updates, and disconnections.
